parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of the brake line can cause sudden brake failure, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Sudden brake pedal drop to the floor
loss of brake pressure
inability to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake rotor failure can cause loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Sudden snapping or breaking of the brake rotors
loss of braking power
grinding or screeching noises when applying the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The alleged design flaw in the brake system can cause uneven brake wear, overheating, and loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Vehicle pulling to one side
wobbling or vibrating when braking
uneven brake wear
overheating brake fluid
rough brake surfaces.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Sudden loss of brake pedal pressure
brake pedal dropping to the floor
temporary loss of brake function
followed by sudden return of brake action.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden separation of the tire tread from the sidewall or a tire blowout can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents, damage to the vehicle, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The tire tread separates from the sidewall
the tire blows out
loss of vehicle control
damage to the vehicle's body or components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the spare tire carrier cable can cause the spare tire to become dislodged while driving, potentially leading to accidents or damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The spare tire carrier cable breaks or fails
the spare tire becomes dislodged while driving
the vehicle may experience unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to notify vehicle owners of recalls can lead to unresolved safety issues, potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle owners are not informed of recalls
owners are not aware of potential safety issues with their vehicle
owners may not take necessary actions to address safety concerns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch release lever can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal goes to the floor and stays there
the clutch pedal feels stuck
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission to downshift properly can cause the vehicle to lose power, especially when towing or driving uphill, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power when towing or driving uphill
the transmission does not downshift properly
the vehicle struggles to maintain speed.
